main event: An observer reported seeing a bright, round, bluish-white object in Lafayette Hill, Pennsylvania on January 18, 1967.
interesting points: The object was initially moving slowly and then seemed to glide sideways., The observer rushed inside to inform family, but the object disappeared before he could return with a camera., The object was sighted multiple times, including a repeat sighting on February 3, 1967., Witnesses described the object as having a red and green light and hovering in one spot., The observer attempted to take photographs, though the quality was poor due to camera instability.
witness description: The primary observer described the object as moving at a high speed and hovering with no visible means of propulsion; other witnesses included family and friends.
